(Hey guys, I'm new, duh, and was hoping I could join
up with an underdog faction. I don't want to be left
in the
dust. So here's my first post.)

The Nightblade:

     Her EEV (Emergency Escape Vehicle) chrashed in
the woods of primitave Maine. The new version of the
protoform was what she was. But soon her built in DNA
scanner picked up the DNA of a large Black Timberwolf.
She had a few memories of her past, but the crash
scrambled most of her memory circuts. She transformed
to beast form and sat down and howled into the air and
her comm unit.
